snippet: Cyress Smith proposes inviting the public to officers’ training sessions and other measures to improve relations between law enforcement and New Yorkers,
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column focuses on views of New York City Police Officer Cyress Smith, who stresses that, in light of recent tensions, more should be done to promote understanding between police and public.
lead_paragraph: Cyress Smith proposes inviting the public to officers’ training sessions and other measures to improve relations between law enforcement and New Yorkers,

headline.print_headline: Reflections of a Student Protester Who Became a Police Sergeant
headline.main: Reflections of a Student Protester Who Became a Police Sergeant
